alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 4:00AM CDT until July 07 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Ellis County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 445 AM CDT. * At 400 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Follett, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Shattuck, Arnett, and Gage. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
